discussion.p: If a codecvt conversion returns codecvt_base::error should that be treated as EOF? An exception? Should all the successfully converted characters before a conversion error be available to the users of the wbuffer_convert and/or the internal streambuf, or does a conversion error lose information?
discussion.note: 2025-11-10 Resolved by the removal of wbuffer_convert via paper in Tokyo, 2024. Status changed: New → Resolved.
